      • scheduleRoute

        public Route scheduleRoute(java.lang.String start,
                           java.lang.String finish,
                           boolean skateboard,
                           boolean minimize_time)
        schedule a route accourding input parameters, if there is no connect path, print error message
        Parameters:
        start - start location of the route
        finish - end location of the route
        skateboard - if user have specify to use or not to use skateboard
        minimize_time - if user have specify to schedule a route which has minimum distance or will cost minimum time
        Returns:
        schedule route

      • scheduleTour

        public Route scheduleTour(java.lang.String start,
                          boolean skateboard,
                          boolean minimize_time)
        Parameters:
        start - start point of the Tour schedule by MST which generated by Prim algorithm
        skateboard - if user want to use skateboard
        minimize_time - if user want a route which cost least time
        Returns:
        shecdule route

      • scheduleShortestTour

        public Route scheduleShortestTour(java.lang.String start,
                                  java.lang.String end,
                                  boolean skateboard,
                                  boolean minimize_time)
        shedule a better tour route which is based on MST and Christofides algorithm, first we generate a minimum spanning tree and find out all the location is the graph which have odd degree. Then we use greedy match algorithm match all such locations by pair and generate a shortcut graph. Next, we all the shortcut graph on the original MST to generate a new graph both contain MST edge and Shortcut edge Finally, we find out possible Hamiltonian cycle after we find out the Eulerian Circuit for the graph
        Parameters:
        start - start location of the tour
        end - end location of the tour
        skateboard - if user want to use skateboard
        minimize_time - if user want a route which cost least time
        Returns:
        shecdule route

      • getOddDegreeLocation

        public boolean[] getOddDegreeLocation(boolean[][] matrix)
        find out all the Location in a MST whose degree is odd
        Parameters:
        matrix - MST generated by kruskal algorithm
        Returns:
        a list of locations denoted by array of boolean array, if ith element of the array is true, that's mean the degree of this node is odd

      • MinimumWeightMatching

        public boolean[][] MinimumWeightMatching(boolean[] odloc,
                                         boolean skateboard,
                                         boolean minimize_time)
        Greedy match algorithm which pairs all the odd degree location
        Parameters:
        odloc - a list of locations denoted by array of boolean array, if ith element of the array is true, that's mean the degree of this node is odd
        skateboard - if user want to use skateboard
        minimize_time - if user want a route which cost least time
        Returns:
        a matrix which denote shortcut graph
